Medifor

Gallery

Probe Inspector
➡️ Receives probe ID
↩️ New probe ID will reset PZR status
💾 Stores probe ID and PZR status
➡️❗ Receives PZR updates and reset requests as events and updates data
Probe Actions: PZR - Color Map - Downloads
➡️ Receives PZR status
⬆️ Sends PZR updates, colormap changes, and resets as events
Image Viewer or Video Player
➡️ Receives probe ID and PZR status
💾 Stores pause/play status and video meta information (duration, current time, etc)
➡️❗ Receives PZR updates and reset requests as events and updates data
Parent container for image or video PZR
➡️ Receives probe ID, PZR status, and scrubber location and performs the necessary PZR transformations.
Video Player only
⬆️ Sends pause/play status and video meta information as events
Video Controls and Status
➡️ Receives pause/play status and video meta information
⬆️ Sends pause/play and clicked scrubber location as events
